Titles.jpn: Chibi Maruko-chan: Watashi no suki-na uta

Summaries.eng: Maruko gets to know a painting girl Shizuka and they become good friends. They both paint down their favourite one song. Before long, Shizuka moves away with her husband and that makes Maruko sad. The little girl cherishes every memories about her friend.

Aliases: ちびまる子ちゃん わたしの好きな歌
